content:
I need to know the scores of the football matches played on last world cup final date
Begin!
Question: Could you please provide the exact date when the last World Cup final took place?

I can use the "get_scores_for_given_date" function to fetch the scores of the football matches on December 18th, 2022. Let me execute the call to check the results for that date.

Now, I will proceed to call the function.

It seems that there were no football matches recorded on December 18, 2022, which suggests that there might be no available data for the World Cup finals on that date. 

Let me finalize the result and share it in a way that informs the user accordingly.

function.arguments: {"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"There were no recorded football matches on the date of December 18, 2022."}
function.name: Finish
